name: Darren Hardy
background: American author, speaker, and former publisher/CEO of SUCCESS magazine (2007-2015). Built success media businesses including TV networks. Started first business at 18. Known for studying high achievers and sharing their strategies.

principles.name: Be the exception
principles.description: Outwork others through discipline and persistence.
principles.falsification: When be the exception leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Compound Effect
principles.description: Small, consistent choices compound over time into massive results.
principles.falsification: When compound effect leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Daily routines and habits
principles.description: Success from consistent small actions, like morning routines.
principles.falsification: When daily routines and habits leads to worse outcomes than alternatives

principles.name: Influence Your Environment
principles.description: Choose associations, inputs, and routines that accelerate positive compounding.
principles.falsification: When influence your environment leads to worse outcomes than alternatives
